parameters.name: AppUid
parameters.description: The ID of the user that sends the message. The ID can be up to 16 characters in length.

parameters.name: Priority
parameters.description:
The priority of the message. Valid values:

*   **1**
*   **2**: This is the default value.
*   **3**

parameters.name: RoomId
parameters.description: The ID of the room. The ID can be up to 16 characters in length.

parameters.name: ToAppUid
parameters.description: The ID of the user to receive the message. The ID can be up to 16 characters in length.
